name: Minimal
description: Unique logic game with simple controls and addictive gameplay. There is no story, no clutter - everything is simple, minimalistic. Whole game tries to keep you focused on one simple goal, which is solving current puzzle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Graphics: Intel integrated graphics
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT
